title: 17-year-old dies in accidental shooting in Limestone County
content:
A 17-year-old boy accidentally shot and killed himself while playing with a handgun in Toney, Limestone County Sheriff's Office said.
Spokesman Stephen Young said the accidental shooting occurred Wednesday in a residence in the 25000 block of Alabama 251. The teen died from a single gunshot wound at the scene.
Young said the name of the victim will not be released because he is a minor.
